last_episode_to_air.name: Bye Bye Terrace House in Aloha State
last_episode_to_air.overview: The other housemates decide to leave early so Taishi and Chikako can have a night alone. Everyone is making plans to go to Japan.

name: Terrace House: Aloha State
original_name: テラスハウス Aloha State
overview: The beautiful island of Oahu is host to a new batch of six strangers who share a single roof, multiple conflicts and no script in this reality series.

episodes.name: Terrace House in Aloha State
episodes.overview: Terrace House is back with six new members! As they slowly trickle in, they get acquainted with each other and their beautiful new home.

episodes.name: The 18-Year-Old Madonna
episodes.overview: The house blackboard is filling up with everyone's plans. Lauren takes Yuya and Naomi into town and the three bond at Coffee Talk.

episodes.name: The Reason Why He Can't Get a Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Avian helps Naomi find a restaurant job. Yuya heads to his language school to take a placement test. Lauren's drawings continue to improve.

episodes.name: More Than a Hug
episodes.overview: Avian and Lauren meet with Eric to encourage him to apologize to Naomi. Naomi's job interview goes well and she thanks Yusuke for his help.

episodes.name: Living in a Shared House Is Tough
episodes.overview: Everyone heads to Waimea Bay Beach Park, where Lauren explains what happened with her job. Later, Yuya and Yusuke talk about relationships.

episodes.name: Making My Move
episodes.overview: Eric and Lauren go to the farmer's market to try some coconut. Naomi successfully hostesses her first table. Yusuke has a heart-to-heart with his dad.

episodes.name: She Is a Legend
episodes.overview: Naomi asks Yuya out, but he turns her down. Later, she overhears him making plans with Avian. Yusuke and Avian check out Lauren's fashion show.

episodes.name: Taste of Catfish on the First Date
episodes.overview: Yusuke prepares for his date with Lauren, but she's apprehensive. Yuya tells Avian he's serious about her, but she thinks Naomi may be a better match.

episodes.name: Black Tears
episodes.overview: Avian helps Yusuke get over his date. Meanwhile, Naomi has a special request for Avian, who puts pressure on Lauren to change her Thanksgiving plans.

episodes.name: It's You
episodes.overview: The residents hold back their tears and see Naomi off. Eric likes Lauren, but worries about the age gap. Avian and Yuya enjoy a candlelit dinner.

episodes.name: A Love to Die For
episodes.overview: The housemates meet the new male cast member, Taishi, who's looking for a love to die for. At age 29, he doesn't want to waste any time.

episodes.name: Pretty Guy
episodes.overview: Taishi and Avian spend some quality time together, then Anna and Taishi share a hug. Eric leaves the House and a new cast member arrives.

episodes.name: A Secret Crush
episodes.overview: Pro surfer Guy shows his skills. Yuya and Avian head out for a romantic Christmas dinner that starts well but ends on a disappointing note.

episodes.name: Love Kicks Off
episodes.overview: The house attends Lauren's art exhibition. She's crushing on Taishi but confesses to Avian that she's never asked a guy out on a date before.

episodes.name: One Direction
episodes.overview: Lauren and Taishi head out on their nighttime walk together. Later, he invites Anna on a horseriding date. Guy changes his image in an unexpected way.

episodes.name: The Pipeline: Where Surfing Lives
episodes.overview: Lauren prepares for a big change. The members head to Ehukai Beach Park to see Guy surf the Pipeline, but he comes home with an unfortunate surprise.

episodes.name: Shirofune
episodes.overview: The house undergoes a tearful transition, Yuya rethinks the status of his relationship, and a new member makes her first appearance at the house.

episodes.name: Everyone's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Taishi takes the lead at dinner with cute new member Niki. The house reacts to Yuya and Avian's announcement. A former member makes an appearance.

episodes.name: A Long & Winding Road to Love
episodes.overview: Guy finally makes his return to surfing and has a long chat with Taishi afterward. Niki tells Taishi about the results of her job interview.

episodes.name: Guilty Samurai
episodes.overview: Guy makes an exciting announcement to the house. A worried Taishi turns to Avian for romantic guidance, then dispenses some life advice to Yuya.

episodes.name: Plan it or Wing it
episodes.overview: Taishi and Niki head to the climbing gym for their well-planned date. Later, Niki and Guy hang out in the living room together.

episodes.name: Losing the Lead Role
episodes.overview: The house -- and a surprise guest -- attend Avian's swimsuit brand launch party. Two residents depart and two new members prepare to enter the house.

episodes.name: She's Not Much of a Nature-Lover
episodes.overview: Guy and Niki spend the day at the beach, then head to Cinnamon's to catch a show. Later that night, Taishi and Cheri have a chat by the pool.

episodes.name: A Kiss in the Moment
episodes.overview: Cheri confronts Taishi about his womanizing ways. Guy asks Niki directly about their date, and about her impending departure.

episodes.name: I Love You, Sayonara
episodes.overview: Guy and Niki still haven't talked about their feelings directly. It's the night before Niki's departure, but she might not be the only one leaving.

episodes.name: Erotic Frequency
episodes.overview: Two new housemates join the group: former fashion student Jennifer Mila and long-term Hawaii resident Chikako. Taishi is smitten with Chikako.

episodes.name: No One Like You
episodes.overview: Moving fast, Taishi invites Chikako on a date to an izakaya. Meanwhile, Cheri and Mila go see Eric and plan to attend Wez's show.

episodes.name: Isn't She Just a Bitch?
episodes.overview: After hitting it off on their date, Taishi and Chikako make plans to go hiking together. Cheri and Eric meet for breakfast, but she has other plans.

episodes.name: Too Much
episodes.overview: Pouring rain interrupts Taishi and Chikako's hiking trip. Guy and Mila make dinner plans, while Cheri tells Eric she's been seeing other guys.

episodes.name: The Secret Hook Up
episodes.overview: Guy's departure date approaches while everyone teases Taishi about giving Chikako socks. Late one night, Cheri and Eric go out drinking.

episodes.name: Lonesome Women
episodes.overview: After spending the night with Eric, Cheri goes on a date with Connor, a Russian college student. Anna comes to visit her old housemates.

episodes.name: The Monster She Made
episodes.overview: Salaryman Ryo moves in from Japan and immediately gets into surfing. After asking about Taishi's feelings, Chikako goes for coffee with Ryo.

episodes.name: The Blues of Bruno Mars
episodes.overview: After her ex-husband sends her a message saying he still loves her, Chikako agrees to meet him. Later, she talks with Taishi.

episodes.name: Breakdown
episodes.overview: Taishi takes point at a tense house meeting in which the members tell Cheri they feel disrespected. The next day she goes on a picnic with Ryo.

episodes.name: Shinuhodo No Koi
episodes.overview: Taishi is about to turn 30, and he plans a big date with Chikako, writing out a script the night before. The housemates try Kona coffee.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Terrace House in Aloha State
episodes.overview: The other housemates decide to leave early so Taishi and Chikako can have a night alone. Everyone is making plans to go to Japan.
